name: boyishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is like a boy: He is still boyishly handsome at the age of 45. She wears her hair boyishly short. See
boyish
More examplesFewer examples"Can you believe it?" he exclaims boyishly.He was boyishly dressed in jeans and a baseball hat.He is still boyishly sincere and eager to please at the age of 43.
